title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, January 15, 2022
description: Today is the birthday of Martin Luther King Jr. (1929). He said, "If a man hasn't discovered something that he will die for, he isn't fit to live."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Martin Luther King Jr. (1929). He said, "If a man hasn't discovered something that he will die for, he isn't fit to live."
